name: Tyrone UPSHUR, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, Pennsylvania, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Upshur v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Tyrone UPSHUR, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of July, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
954 A.2d 572
Tyrone UPSHUR, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, Pennsylvania, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 25, 2008.
